TTAudioSignal Class Reference

#include <MaxAudioSignal.h>

Detailed Description

An object containing a set of audio vectors. This object serves as the primary mechanism for passing audio between TTBlue objects. It contains a set of audio vectors, specifically pointers to TTAudioSample values.

Because this code is used in audio-contexts, with high-performance demands, all members are made public for direct access in audio processing loops.
